Subskills.name: One with the Poison
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range and area of effect radius of toxic flask.

Subskills.name: Harmful Vial
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by toxic flask.

Subskills.name: Plague Radiator
Subskills.description: Toxic flask emmits toxic clouds towards nearby monsters inflicting poisoned when hitting the ground.

Subskills.name: Modest Poison
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of toxic flask.

Subskills.name: Decomposing Materia
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Heatseeking Flask
Subskills.description: Toxic flasks home into the nearest monster with increased projectile speed after reaching the highest altitude.

Subskills.name: Resistant Crystal
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of ground bounces for toxic flask.

Subskills.name: Apothecary
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional toxic flask.

Subskills.name: Vial of Alchemy
Subskills.description: Throwing toxic flask at yourself or an ally empowers them with toxins granting increased damage, life and damage reduction.

Subskills.name: Fake Throw
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to throw an additional toxic flask high in the air falling straight down with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Agile Tosser
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using toxic flask.

Subskills.name: Flask Flip
Subskills.description: Teleport into target location when toxic flask hits the ground.

Subskills.name: Toxin Vials
Subskills.description: Throw multiple small toxic flasks in an arc.

Subskills.name: Glassblowing Technician
Subskills.description: Toxic flask breaks into glass shards dealing its damage as physical and ignoring all target defense.
